Jesu Kristu; kwete nemvura yega, asi nemvura neropa. Zvino Mweya ndiye anopupura, nokuti Mweya ichokwadi.
Nokuti kune vatatu vanopupura kudenga, Baba, Shoko, naMweya Mutsvene; uye ava vatatu ndimumwe.
Uye kune vatatu vanopupura panyika, Mweya, nemvura, neropa, uye ava vatatu vanonova chimwe.
Kana tichigamuchira uchapupu hwevanhu, uchapupu hwaMwari hwakapfuura kukura; nokuti uhu uchapupu hwaMwari, hwaakapupura pamusoro peMwanakomana wake.
Uyo anotenda kuMwanakomana waMwari ane uchapupu maari pachake; asingatendi Mwari wakamuita murevi wenhema, nokuti haana kutenda uchapupu Mwari hwaakapupura maererano neMwanakomana wake.
Uye uhu ndihwo uchapupu, kuti Mwari wakatipa upenyu husingaperi; zvino upenyu uhu huri muMwanakomana wake.
Uyo ane Mwanakomana ane upenyu; uyo asina Mwanakomana waMwari haana upenyu.
Zvinhu izvi ndazvinyora kwamuri imwi munotenda kuzita reMwanakomana waMwari, kuti muzive kuti mune upenyu husingaperi, uye kuti mutende kuzita reMwanakomana waMwari.
Uye uhu ndihwo ushingi hwatinahwo maari, kuti kana tichikumbira chinhu zvinoenderana nekuda kwake, anotinzwa;
zvino kana tichiziva kuti anotinzwa, zvese zvatinokumbira, tinoziva kuti tine zvichemo zvatakakumbira kwaari.
Kana umwe achiona hama yake ichitadza chivi chisiri cherufu, achakumbira, uye achamupa upenyu kune vasingatadzi chivi cherufu. Chiripo chivi cherufu; handisi kuti akumbire pamusoro pechichi.
Kusarurama kwese chivi; uye chivi chiripo chisiri cherufu.
Tinoziva kuti ani nani wakaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari haatadzi; asi uyo wakaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari anozvichengeta, uye wakaipa haamubati.
Tinoziva kuti tiri vanobva kuna Mwari, nenyika yese irere muzvakaipa.

Uye tinoziva kuti Mwanakomana waMwari wakauya, akatipa kunzwisisa kuti tizive iye wechokwadi; nesu tiri mune wechokwadi, muMwanakomana wake Jesu Kristu. Uyu ndiye Mwari wechokwadi, neupenyu husingaperi.
Vana vadiki, zvichengetedzei pazvifananidzo. Ameni.
II John: Mukuru kuna amai vakasanangurwa nekuvana vavo, ini vandinoda muchokwadi, uye kwete ini ndega, asiwo vese vakaziva chokwadi,
nekuda kwechokwadi chinogara matiri, uye chichava nesu nekusingaperi.
rugare zvinobva kuna Mwari Baba, nekuna Ishe Jesu Kristu Mwanakomana waBaba, muchokwadi nerudo.
Ndinofara zvikuru kuti ndakawana kubva pavana vako vanofamba muchokwadi, sezvatakagamuchira murairo kuna Baba.
Ikozvinowo ndinokukumbirisai, amai, kwete sendinokunyorerai murairo mutsva, asi uyo watakange tinawo kubva pakutanga, kuti tidanane.
Zvino urwu ndirwo rudo, kuti tifambe zvinoenderana nemirairo yake. Uyu ndiwo murairo, sezvamakanzwa kubva pakutanga, kuti mufambe mauri.
Nokuti vanyepedzeri vazhinji vakapinda munyika, vasingabvumi kuti Jesu Kristu wakauya panyama. Uyu ndiye munyepedzeri nemupikisi waKristu.
Zvichenjererei pachenyu, kuti tirege kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvatakabatira, asi tigamuchire mubairo wakakwana.
Ani nani anodarika uye asingagari mudzidziso yaKristu, haana Mwari; asi uyo anogara mudzidziso yaKristu, uyu ana Babawo uye Mwanakomana.
Kana umwe achiuya kwamuri, asingauyi nedzidziso iyi, musamugamuchira mumba, kana kuti kwaari: Kwaziwai;
nokuti anoti kwaari: Kwaziwai, anodyidzana nemabasa ake akaipa.
Kunyange ndine zvinhu zvizhinji zvekunyora kwamuri, handina kuda
pabepa neingi; asi ndinotarisira kuuya kwamuri, uye kutaura muromo nemuromo, kuti mufaro wenyu uve wakazara.
Vana vemunin'ina wenyu wakasanangurwa vanokukwazisai. Ameni.
III John: Mukuru, kuna Gayo anodikanwa, wandinoda ini pachokwadi.
Mudikanwi, ndinonyengetera pazvinhu zvese kuti ubudirire, uye ugwinye, semweya wako uchibudirira.
Nokuti ndakafara zvikuru, hama padzakasvika ndokupupurira chokwadi chako, sezvaunofamba iwe muchokwadi.
Handina mufaro unopfuura izvi, kuti ndinzwe vana vangu vachifamba muchokwadi.
Mudikanwi, unoita nekutendeka zvese zvaunobata kuhama nekuvaeni,
vakapupurira rudo rwako pamberi pekereke; uchaita zvakanaka kana ukavaperekedza zvakafanira Mwari.
Nokuti nekuda kwezita rake vakabuda vasingagamuchiri chinhu kuvahedheni.
Naizvozvo isu tinofanira kugamuchira vakadaro, kuti tigova vanobatsirana pachokwadi.
Ndakanyorera kereke; asi Dhiotirefesi, anoda kuva wekutanga pakati pavo asingatigamuchiri.

Naizvozvo, kana ndichiuya, ndicharangarira mabasa ake aanoita, achitiitira makuhwa nemashoko akaipa; uye asingagutsikani neizvozvo, kunyange iye amene haagamuchiri hama, uye anovadzivisa vanoda, nekudzinga mukereke.
Mudikanwi, usatevera chakaipa, asi chakanaka. Anoita chakanaka ndeanobva kuna Mwari; asi anoita zvakaipa, haana kuona Mwari.
Dhemetrio anopupurirwa zvakanaka nevese, uye nechokwadi pachacho; nesuwo tinopupura, nemwi munoziva kuti kupupura kwedu ndekwechokwadi.
Ndakange ndine zvizhinji zvekunyora, asi handidi kukunyorera neingi nepeni;
asi ndinovimba kukurumidza kukuona, titauriranewo muromo nemuromo. Rugare kwauri. Vadikanwi vanokukwazisa. Kwazisa vadikanwi nezita.
Jude: Judha muranda waJesu Kristu, uye munin'ina waJakobho, kune vakaitwa vatsvene muna Mwari Baba, uye vakachengetedzwa muna Jesu Kristu, vakadanwa:
Tsitsi kwamuri, nerugare, nerudo, ngazvipamhidzirwe.
Vadikanwi, ndichiita kushingaira kwese kukunyorerai zvekuponeswa kwedu tese, zvakange zvakandifanira kukunyorerai, ndichikurudzira kuti murwire rutendo rwakapiwa vatsvene kamwe.

Nokuti kuna vamwe vanhu vakapinda nekunyangira, vakagara vanyorerwa kupiwa mhosva uku, vasingadi Mwari, vanoshandura nyasha dzaMwari wedu kuita unzenza, uye vachiramba Tenzi umwe wega Mwari, naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Asi ndinoda kukuyeuchidzai, kunyange maiziva ichi kamwe, kuti Ishe aponesa vanhu munyika yeEgipita, pashure akazoparadza avo vakange vasingatendi.

mafungu egungwa anopengereka, anopupuma nyadzi dzawo pachawo; nyeredzi dzinongombeya, vakachengeterwa kusviba kwerima nekusingaperi.

kuzoita mutongo unopikisa vese, nekupa mhosva vese vavo vasingadi Mwari pamusoro pemabasa avo ese ekusada Mwari, avakaita mukusada Mwari, nepamusoro pezvikukutu zvese vatadzi vasingadi Mwari zvavakataura maererano naye.

Nemusoro wake nemavhudzi zvakachena semakushe emakwai machena, semagada echando; uye meso ake semurazvo wemoto;
uye tsoka dzake dzakafanana nendarira yakakwenenzverwa, sedzinenge dzakapiswa muvira remoto; neinzwi rake seinzwi remvura zhinji.
Uye wakange ane muruoko rwake rwerudyi nyeredzi nomwe; zvino mumuromo make makabuda munondo unopinza unocheka mativi maviri; uye chiso chake chaiva sezuva rinopenya musimba raro.
Zvino pandakamuona, ndakawira patsoka dzake sewakafa; ndokuisa ruoko rwake rwerudyi pamusoro pangu, achiti kwandiri: Usatya; ndini wekutanga newekupedzisira;
uye mupenyu; ndakange ndakafawo, zvino tarira, ndiri mupenyu kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni. Uye ndine kiyi dzegehena nedzerufu.
Nyora zvawaona, nezvinhu zviripo, nezvinhu zvichazovapo shure kweizvi.

Chakavanzika chenyeredzi nomwe dzawaona paruoko rwangu rwerudyi, nezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe zvegoridhe. Nyeredzi nomwe ndivo vatumwa vekereke nomwe; nezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe zvawaona ndidzo kereke nomwe.
Kumutumwa wekereke yeEfeso nyora
uti
added
: Zvinhu izvi ndizvo zvinotaura iye wakabata nyeredzi nomwe muruoko rwake rwerudyi, anofamba pakati pezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe zvegoridhe,
achiti:
added
Ndinoziva mabasa ako, nekuremerwa kwako, nekutsungirira kwako, uye kuti haugoni kumirisana nevakaipa, uye wakavaidza ivo vanoti vaapositori asi vasiri ivo, uye wakavawana
vari
added
varevi venhema,
wakamirawo uye ukava nemoyo murefu, uye nekuda kwezita rangu wakarwisa, ukasaneta.
Asi ndine kupikisana newe, kuti wakasiya rudo rwako rwekutanga.

Naizvozvo rangarira pawakawa, uye tendeuka, uitewo mabasa ekutanga; kana zvikasadarowo ndichauya kwauri nekukurumidza, uye ndichabvisa chigadziko chako chemwenje kubva panzvimbo yacho, kana usingatendeuki.
Asi ichi unacho, kuti unovenga mabasa aVaNikoraiti, neni andinovenga.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. Kuna iye anokunda ndichapa kuti adye zvemuti weupenyu uri pakati peParadhiso yaMwari.
Nekumutumwa wekereke yeSimirina nyora
uti
added
: Zvinhu izvi ndizvo zvinotaura Wekutanga neWekupedzisira, wakava akafa ndokurarama:
Ndinoziva mabasa ako nedambudziko neurombo (asi uri mufumi), nekutuka kwevanoti ivo VaJudha pachavo, asi vasiri, asi vari sinagoge raSatani.
Usatya chimwe chezvinhu zvaoda kutambudzika nazvo; tarira, dhiabhorosi woda kukanda
vamwe
added
venyu mutirongo, kuti muidzwe; uye muchava nedambudziko mazuva gumi. Uve wakatendeka kusvikira parufu, zvino ndichakupa korona yeupenyu.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. Anokunda haatongokuvadzwi nerufu rwechipiri.
Uye kumutumwa wekereke yePegamo nyora
uti
added
: Zvinhu izvi anotaura iye ane munondo unopinza mativi maviri:

Ndinoziva mabasa ako uye paunogara, ipo pane chigaro cheushe chaSatani, uye wakabatisisa zita rangu, uye hauna kuramba rutendo rwangu, kunyange pamazuva paiva naAntipasi, chapupu changu chakatendeka, wakaurawa pakati penyu, apo panogara Satani.

Asi ndine zvinhu zvishoma zvinopokana newe, nokuti unavo ipapo vanobatirira dzidziso yaBharami, wakadzidzisa Bharaki kukanda chigumbuso pamberi pevana vaIsraeri, kuti vadye zvakabairwa zvifananidzo nekuita upombwe.
Saizvozvo newe unavo vanobatisisa dzidziso yeVaNikoraiti, chinhu chandinovenga.
Tendeuka; zvino kana zvikasadaro, ndichakurumidza kuuya kwauri, ndigorwa navo nemunondo wemuromo wangu.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. Anokunda, ndichapa kwaari kuti adye kubva pamana yakavanzika, uye ndichamupa ibwe jena, nepabwe
iro
added
zita idzva rakanyorwa, risina anoziva, kunze kweano
ri
added
gamuchira.
Nekumutumwa wekereke iri paTiatira nyora
uti
added
: Izvi anoreva Mwanakomana waMwari, ane meso ake akafanana nemurazvo wemoto, netsoka dzake dzakaita sendarira yakakwenenzverwa:
Ndinoziva mabasa ako, nerudo, nekushumira, nerutendo, nekutsungirira kwako, uye mabasa ako, uye
kuti
added
ekupedzisira anopfuura ekutanga.
Asi ndine zvinhu zvishoma zvinopokana newe, kuti unotendera mukadzi Jezebheri, anozviidza muporofitakadzi kudzidzisa nekutsausa varanda vangu kuti vaite upombwe nekudya zvakabairwa zvifananidzo.
Zvino ndakamupa nguva kuti atendeuke kubva paufeve hwake, asi haana kutendeuka.
Tarira, ini ndichamukandira panhovo, nevanoita upombwe naye padambudziko guru, kana vasingatendeuki kubva pamabasa avo.
Uye ndichauraya vana vake murufu; nemakereke ese achaziva kuti ini ndini ndinonzvera itsvo nemoyo; zvino ndichapa kwamuri umwe neumwe zvinoenderana nemabasa enyu.
Asi ndinotaura kwamuri nekune vamwe vari paTiatira, vese vasina dzidziso iyi, uye vasina kuziva zvakadzika zvaSatani, sezvavanotaura
vachiti
added
: Handingakutakudzii umwe mutoro.
Asi izvo zvamunazvo batisisai kusvikira ndichiuya.
Uye anokunda nekuchengeta mabasa angu kusvikira pakuguma, kwaari ndichapa simba pamusoro pemarudzi;
uye achaatonga netsvimbo yedare; semidziyo yemuumbi achaputsanyiwa; sezvandakagamuchirawo kuna Baba vangu.
Uye ndichamupa nyeredzi yemangwanani.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke.
Uye kumutumwa wekereke iri muSadhisi nyora
uti
added
: Zvinhu izvi anoreva iye ane Mweya minomwe yaMwari nenyeredzi nomwe: Ndinoziva mabasa ako, kuti une zita rekuti unorarama, asi wakafa.
Iva wakarinda, uye simbisa zvinhu zvakasara zvoda kufa; nokuti handina kuwana mabasa ako akaperedzerwa pamberi paMwari.
Naizvozvo rangarira kuti wakagamuchira nekunzwa sei; uye chengeta, uye tendeuka. Naizvozvo kana usingarindi, ndichauya kwauri sembavha, uye haungatongozivi
kuti
added
iawa ripi randichauya naro pamusoro pako.
Une mazita mashoma kunyange paSadhisi asina kusvibiswa nguvo dzawo; uye vachafamba neni mu
nguvo
added
chena, nokuti vakafanira.
Uyo anokunda, ndiye achapfekedzwa nguvo chena; uye handichatongodzimi zita rake pabhuku reupenyu, uye ndichareurura zita rake pamberi paBaba vangu, nepamberi pevatumwa vake.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke.
Nekumutumwa wekereke iri muFiradhefia nyora
uti
added
: Zvinhu izvi anoreva Mutsvene, Wechokwadi, iye ane kiyi yaDhavhidhi, iye anozarura pasinawo anopfiga, nekupfiga pasinawo anozarura:
Ndinoziva mabasa ako; tarira, ndakaisa pamberi pako mukova wakazarurwa, uye hakuna angagona kuupfiga, nokuti une simba shoma, uye wakachengeta shoko rangu, nekusaramba zita rangu.
Tarira, ndicha
ku
added
pa vanobva kusinagoge raSatani, vanozviti VaJudha, vasiri ivo, asi vanoreva nhema; tarira, ndichavaita kuti vauye vagonamata pamberi petsoka dzako, uye vazive kuti ini ndakakuda.
Nokuti wakachengeta shoko rekutsungirira kwangu, neni ndichakuchengeta panguva
ye
added
kuedzwa ichauya pamusoro penyika yese, kuedza vanogara panyika.
Tarira, ndinouya nekukurumidza; batisisa chaunacho, kuti kusava neanotora korona yako.

Uyo anokunda, ndichamuita mbiru mutembere yaMwari wangu, uye haachatongobudizve; uye ndichanyora pamusoro pake zita raMwari wangu, nezita reguta raMwari wangu, reJerusarema idzva, rinoburuka richibva kudenga kuna Mwari wangu, nezita rangu idzva.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke.
Nekumutumwa wekereke yeVaRaodhikia nyora
uti
added
: Zvinhu izvi anoreva Ameni, chapupu chakatendeka uye chechokwadi, kutanga kwezvisikwa zvaMwari:
Ndinoziva mabasa ako, kuti hautonhori uye haupisi. Ndaida kuti dai uchitonhora kana uchipisa.
Zvino zvaunodziya, uye hautonhori uye haupisi, ndichakusvisvina mumuromo mangu.
Nokuti unoti: Ndiri mufumi, uye ndakafuma, uye handishaiwi chinhu, asi hauzivi kuti ndiwe unotambura, neune nhamo, nemurombo, nebofu, newakashama;
ndinokupa zano kuti utenge kwandiri goridhe rakaidzwa mumoto, kuti ufume; nenguvo chena, kuti upfeke, uye nyadzi dzekushama kwako dzirege kuratidzika; uye uzore meso ako nechizoro chameso, kuti uone.
Vese vandinoda ini, ndinotsiura nekuranga. Naizvozvo shingaira utendeuke.
Tarira, ndimire pamukova ndichigogodza; kana umwe achinzwa inzwi rangu, akazarura mukova, ndichapinda kwaari, uye ndicharaira naye, naiye neni.
Anokunda, ndichamupa kugara neni pachigaro changu cheushe, sezvo neni ndakakunda ndikagara pamwe naBaba vangu pachigaro chavo cheushe.
Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zinoreva Mweya kumakereke.
Shure kweizvi ndakaona, zvino tarira, mukova wakazaruka kudenga, nenzwi rekutanga randakanzwa
rakaita
added
serehwamanda richitaura neni, richiti: Kwira pano, ndigokuratidza zvinhu zvinofanira kuitika shure kweizvi.
Zvino pakarepo ndakava muMweya; zvino tarira, chigaro cheushe chakagadzwa kudenga, nepamusoro pechigaro cheushe
umwe
added
agere.
Iye wakange agere pakuonekwa wakange akafanana nebwe rejasipisi* nesadhio*; nemurarabungu wakakomberedza chigaro cheushe waitaridzika sebwe reemaradhi*.

Zvino zvigaro zveushe makumi maviri nezvina zvakange zvakakomberedza chigaro cheushe; nepazvigaro zveushe ndakaona vakuru makumi maviri nevana vagere, vakapfeka nguvo chena, uye vakange vane korona dzegoridhe pamisoro yavo.
Nepachigaro cheushe pakabuda mheni nekutinhira nemanzwi; nemwenje minomwe yemoto ichipfuta pamberi pechigaro cheushe, iri Mweya minomwe yaMwari.
Zvino pamberi pechigaro cheushe pakange
pane
added
gungwa regirazi, rakafanana nekrisitaro*. Nepakati pechigaro cheushe nepakapoteredza chigaro cheushe
pane
added
zvisikwa zvina zvipenyu zvizere nemeso mberi neshure.

Zvino chisikwa chipenyu chekutanga chakange chakafanana neshumba, uye chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chakafanana nemhuru, nechisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chakange chine chiso semunhu, nechisikwa chipenyu chechina chakange chakafanana negondo rinobhururuka.
Nezvisikwa zvipenyu
izvi
added

chimwe nechimwe chakange chine mapapiro matanhatu mativi ese, nemukati zvakange zvizere nemeso; uye hazvizorori masikati neusiku, zvichiti: Mutsvene, mutsvene, mutsvene, Ishe Mwari, Wemasimbaose, wakange aripo, uye aripo, neachazouya.
Zvino apo zvisikwa zvipenyu izvi pazvaimupa kubwinya nerukudzo nekuvongwa iye anogara pachigaro cheushe, iye anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi,
vakuru makumi maviri nevana vakazviwisira pasi pamberi peagere pachigaro cheushe ndokumunamata iye anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi, uye vachikandira korona dzavo pamberi pechigaro cheushe, vachiti:
Makafanira, Ishe, kugamuchira kubwinya, nerukudzo, nesimba; nokuti ndimwi makasika zvinhu zvese, uye nekuda kwechido chenyu zviripo uye zvakasikwa.
Zvino ndakaona muruoko rwerudyi rwaiye wakange agere pachigaro cheushe bhuku rakanyorwa mukati nekunze, rakanamatidzwa nemicherechedzo minomwe.
Zvino ndakaona mutumwa ane simba achidanidzira nenzwi guru;
achiti
added
: Ndiani wakafanira kuzarura bhuku nekusunungura micherechedzo yaro?
Asi kwakange kusina munhu kudenga kana panyika, kana pasi penyika, wakagona kuzarura bhuku, kana kuritarira.
Zvino ini ndakachema zvikuru, nokuti hakuna kutongowanikwa wakafanira kuzarura nekuverenga bhuku, kana kuritarira.
Zvino umwe wevakuru wakati kwandiri: Usachema; tarira, yakunda Shumba inobva kurudzi rwaJudha, Mudzi waDhavhidhi, kuti izarure bhuku nekusunungura micherechedzo yaro minomwe.

Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, pakati pechigaro cheushe nechezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, nepakati pevakuru, Gwayana rimire serakabaiwa, rine nyanga nomwe nemeso manomwe, ndiyo Mweya minomwe yaMwari yakatumwa kunyika yese.
Zvino rakauya, rikatora bhuku kubva muruoko rwerudyi rwaiye wakagara pachigaro cheushe.

Zvino rakati ratora bhuku, zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina nevakuru makumi maviri nevana vakawira pamberi peGwayana, umwe neumwe ane rudimbwa nendiro dzegoridhe dzizere nezvinonhuhwira inova minyengetero yevatsvene.

Zvino vakaimba rwiyo rutsva, vachiti: Makafanira kutora bhuku, nekuzarura micherechedzo yaro; nokuti makabaiwa, ndokutidzikunurira Mwari neropa renyu kubva kudzinza rese, nekururimi, nekuvanhu, nekurudzi,
makatiitawo kuna Mwari wedu tive madzimambo nevapristi, uye tichatonga panyika.
Zvino ndakaona, uye ndakanzwa inzwi revatumwa vazhinji vakakomberedza chigaro cheushe, nezvisikwa zvipenyu nevakuru; nekuwanda kwazvo kwakange kuri mazana nemazana emazana nemazana, nezvuru zvezvuru,
vachiti nenzwi guru: Rakafanira Gwayana rakabaiwa kugamuchira simba neufumi nenjere nemasimba nerukudzo nekubwinya nekurumbidzwa.

Nechisikwa chega-chega chiri kudenga, nepanyika, nepasi penyika, nezviri pagungwa nezvese zviri mazviri, ndakanzwa zvichiti: Kuna iye agere pamusoro pechigaro cheushe nekuGwayana ngakuve nekurumbidzwa, nerukudzo, nekubwinya, nesimba kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Zvino zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvakati: Ameni. Nevakuru makumi maviri nevana vakawa, vakanamata iye anorarama kusvika rinhi narinhi.
Zvino ndakaona Gwayana parakazarura chimwe chemicherechedzo, ndokunzwa chimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chichiti, senzwi remutinhiro: Uya uone.
Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, bhiza jena, naiye wakaritasva wakange ane uta; korona ndokupiwa kwaari, zvino akabuda achikunda, uye kuti akunde.
Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechipiri, ndakanzwa chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chichiti: Uya uone.
Zvino kwakabuda rimwe bhiza dzvuku; newakaritasva akapiwa
simba
added
kuti abvise rugare panyika, nokuti vaurayane; ndokupiwa kwaari munondo mukuru.

Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechitatu, ndakanzwa chisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chichiti: Uya uone. Zvino ndikaona, uye tarira, bhiza dema, newakange akaritasva wakange ane chiyereso muruoko rwake.
Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi pakati pezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina richiti: Chiyero chezviyo nedhenario*, nezviyero zvitatu zvebhari* nedhenario; nemafuta newaini usa
zvi
added
tadzira.
Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechina, ndakanzwa inzwi rechisikwa chipenyu chechina richiti: Uya uone.

Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, bhiza rakachenuruka, newakange akaritasva zita rake Rufu; uye hadhesi rakateverana naye. Simba ndokupiwa kwazviri kuuraya kusvika pane chechina chenyika, nemunondo, uye nenzara, uye nerufu, uye nezvikara zvenyika.
Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechishanu, ndakaona pasi pearitari mweya yevakange vaurawa nekuda kweshoko raMwari, uye nekuda kweuchapupu hwavaiva nahwo.
Zvino vakadana nenzwi guru vachiti: Kusvikira rinhi, Tenzi, mutsvene uye wechokwadi, regai kutonga nekutsiva ropa redu pane vanogara panyika?
Zvino kwakapiwa umwe neumwe nguvo refu chena, zvikanzi kwavari vambozorora chinguva chidiki kusvikira vamwewo varanda pamwe navo nehama dzavo dzaiva dzoda kuurawa saivowo vakwaniswa.
Zvino ndakaona parakange razarura mucherechedzo wechitanhatu, uye tarira, kwakava nekudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, uye zuva rakasviba sesaga remvere, nemwedzi ukaita seropa;
nenyeredzi dzedenga dzakawira panyika, semuonde unowisa maonde awo eshure, uchizuzwa nemhepo huru.
Zvino denga rakabva serugwaro rwakapetwa; negomo rega-rega nechiwi zvakabviswa panzvimbo dzazvo.
Nemadzimambo enyika, nevanhu vakuru, nevafumi, nevatungamiriri vehondo, nevane simba, nevaranda vese, nevakasununguka vese vakanozvivanza mumapako nemumabwe emakomo,
zvino vakati kumakomo nekumabwe: Wirai pamusoro pedu, mutivige pachiso chaiye anogara pachigaro cheushe, nepakutsamwa kweGwayana;
nokuti zuva guru rekutsamwa kwaro rasvika; zvino ndiani anogona kumira?
Zvino shure kweizvi ndakaona vatumwa vana vamire kumativi mana enyika vakabata mhepo ina dzenyika, kuti mhepo irege kuvhuvhuta panyika, kana pagungwa, kana pamuti upi zvawo.
Uye ndakaona umwe mutumwa achikwira kubva kumabvazuva kwezuva ane mucherechedzo waMwari mupenyu; akadana nenzwi guru kuvatumwa vana, vaya vakange vapiwa
simba
added
kuti vatadzire nyika negungwa,
achiti: Musatadzira nyika, kana gungwa, kana miti, kusvikira taisa mucherechedzo varanda vaMwari wedu pahuma dzavo.
Zvino ndakanzwa uwandu hwevakaiswa mucherechedzo: Zvuru zana nemakumi mana nezvina vakaiswa mucherechedzo kubva kumarudzi ese evana vaIsraeri.

Kubva kurudzi rwaJudha zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaRubheni zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaGadhi zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo;

kubva kurudzi rwaAsheri zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaNafutarimi zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaManase zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo;

kubva kurudzi rwaSimioni zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaRevhi zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaIsaskari zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo;

kubva kurudzi rwaZebhuruni zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaJosefa zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaBhenjamini zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo.

Shure kwaizvozvi ndakaona, zvino tarira, chaunga chikuru, chisina anogona kuverenga, chinobva kundudzi dzese, nemarudzi, nevanhu, nendimi, vakamira pamberi pechigaro cheushe nepamberi peGwayana, vakamonera nguvo refu chena, nemichindwe mumaoko avo;
zvino vakadanidzira nenzwi guru, vachiti: Ruponeso
ngaruve
added
kuna Mwari wedu anogara pachigaro cheushe, nekuGwayana.
Zvino vatumwa vese vakamira vakakomba chigaro cheushe nevakuru nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, vakawa pamberi pechigaro cheushe nezviso zvavo, ndokunamata Mwari,
vachiti: Ameni: Kurumbidzwa nekubwinya nenjere nekuvonga nerukudzo nesimba nemasimba
ngazvive
added
kuna Mwari wedu kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
Zvino umwe wevakuru wakapindura, achiti kwandiri: Ava vakapfeka nguvo refu chena ndivana ani, uye vakabvepi?
Zvino ndakati kwaari: Ishe, ndimwi munoziva. Zvino akati kwandiri: Ava ndivo vanobva mukutambudzika kukuru, uye vakasuka nguvo refu dzavo, uye ivo vakadzichenesa muropa reGwayana.
Nekuda kweizvi vari pamberi pechigaro cheushe chaMwari, vanomushumira masikati neusiku mutembere yake; uye anogara pachigaro cheushe achatandavadza tende pamusoro pavo.
Havachazombovi nenzara kana kuzombova nenyota, nezuva haringatongovawiri, kana kupisa kupi zvako;
nokuti Gwayana riri pakati pechigaro cheushe richavafunda, uye richavatungamirira kuzvitubu zvipenyu zvemvura; uye Mwari achapusika misodzi yese pameso avo.
Zvino wakati azarura mucherechedzo wechinomwe, kwakavapo kunyarara kudenga kwakaita sehafu yeawa.
Zvino ndakaona vatumwa vanomwe vamire pamberi paMwari, kukapiwawo kwavari hwamanda nomwe.

Zvino umwe mutumwa wakauya akamira paaritari, ane mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira wegoridhe; kukapiwa kwaari zvinonhuhwira zvizhinji, kuti azvipe neminyengetero yevatsvene vese pamusoro pearitari yegoridhe yakange iri pamberi pechigaro cheushe.
Zvino utsi hwezvinonhuhwira hwakakwira neminyengetero yevatsvene huchibva muruoko rwemutumwa pamberi paMwari.
Mutumwa akatora mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira, ndokuuzadza nemoto wearitari, ndoku
u
added
kanda panyika; zvino kwakavapo manzwi nekutinhira nemheni nekudengenyeka kwenyika.
Zvino vatumwa vanomwe vakange vane hwamanda nomwe vakazvigadzirira kuti varidze.
Zvino mutumwa wekutanga wakaridza, ndokuvapo chimvuramabwe nemoto zvakavhenganiswa neropa, ndokukandwa panyika; nechetatu chemiti chakapiswa, neuswa unyoro hwese hwakapiswa.
Zvino mutumwa wechipiri wakaridza, zvino
chimwe
added
segomo guru rinopfuta nemoto chikakandwa mugungwa; chetatu chegungwa ndokuva ropa;
ndokufa chetatu chezvisikwa zviri mugungwa zvine upenyu, nechetatu chezvikepe chikaparadzwa.
Zvino mutumwa wechitatu wakaridza, kukawa kubva kudenga nyeredzi huru, ichipfuta semwenje, ndokuwira pamusoro pechetatu chenzizi, nepamusoro pezvitubu zvemvura.
Zvino zita renyeredzi rainzi Gavakava; chetatu chemvura ndokuva gavakava, nevanhu vazhinji vakafa nemvura, nokuti yakange yavaviswa.

Zvino mutumwa wechina wakaridza, chetatu chezuva ndokurohwa nechetatu chemwedzi nechetatu chenyeredzi, kuti chetatu chazvo chisvibiswe, uye kuti chetatu chemasikati chirege kuvhenekera, neusiku saizvozvo.

Zvino ndakatarira, ndokunzwa mutumwa umwe achibhururuka ari pakati pedenga achiti nenzwi guru: Mune nhamo, mune nhamo, mune nhamo vagari vepanyika, pamanzwi asara ehwamanda yevatumwa vatatu vachazoridza!
Zvino mutumwa wechishanu wakaridza, zvino ndakaona nyeredzi ichibva kudenga ichiwira panyika, ndokupiwa kwaari kiyi yegomba risina chigadziko.
Zvino yakazarura gomba risina chigadziko, utsi ndokusimuka kubva mugomba seutsi hwevira guru, nezuva nedenga zvikasvibiswa nekuda kweutsi hwegomba.
Zvino muutsi mukabuda mhashu dzikauya panyika, ndokupiwa kwadziri simba, sezvinyavada zvenyika zvine simba.
Kukanzi kwadziri dzirege kutadzira uswa hwenyika, kana chipi zvacho chinyoro, kana muti upi, asi vanhu chete vasina mucherechedzo waMwari pahuma dzavo.
Zvino kwakapiwa kwadziri kuti dzisavauraya, asi kuti varwadziswe mwedzi mishanu; uye kurwadzisa kwadzo kwaiita sekurwadzisa kwechinyavada kana chichiruma munhu.
Zvino pamazuva iwayo vanhu vachatsvaka rufu, asi havangaruwani; uye vachashuva kufa, asi rufu rwuchavatiza.
Uye zvimiro zvemhashu zvakaita semabhiza akagadzirirwa hondo; nepamisoro yadzo pane zvakaita sekorona dzakafanana negoridhe, nezviso zvadzo sezviso zvevanhu.
Zvino dzakange dzine vhudzi sevhudzi revakadzi, nemeno adzo akaita seeshumba.
Zvino dzakange dzine zvidzitiro zvechifuva zvakaita sezvidzitiro zvechifuva zvedare, nekutinhira kwemapapiro adzo sekutinhira kwengoro dzemabhiza mazhinji achimhanyira kuhondo.
Zvino dzakange dzine miswe yakafanana nezvinyavada, uye pakange pane umborera pamiswe yadzo, nesimba radzo rekukuvadza vanhu mwedzi mishanu.
Zvino dzakange dzina mambo pamusoro padzo, mutumwa wegomba risina chigadziko, zita rake nechiHebheru riri Abhadhoni, uye nechiGiriki ane zita Aporioni.
Nhamo imwe yapfuura; tarira, kuchiri kuuya nhamo mbiri shure kweizvi.
Zvino mutumwa wechitanhatu wakaridza, zvino ndakanzwa inzwi kubva panyanga ina dzearitari yegoridhe iri pamberi paMwari,
richiti kumutumwa wechitanhatu wakange ane hwamanda: Sunungura vatumwa vana vakasungwa parwizi rukuru Yufuratesi.
Zvino vakasunungurwa vatumwa vana vakange vakagadzirirwa awa nezuva nemwedzi negore, kuti vauraye chetatu chevanhu.
Zvino uwandu hwehondo dzevatasvi vemabhiza hwaiva makumi ezvuru maviri emakumi ezvuru; ndakanzwawo uwandu hwavo.

Zvino saizvozvo ndakaona mabhiza muchiratidzo, nevakange vakaatasva, vane zvidzitiro zvechifuva zvemoto, nezvehiasindo*, nezvesarufa*, nemisoro yemabhiza semisoro yeshumba, nemumiromo yawo makabuda moto neutsi nesarufa.
Neizvi zvitatu kwakaurawa chetatu chevanhu, nemoto uye neutsi uye nesarufa, zvakabuda mumiromo yawo.
Nokuti simba rawo riri mumuromo wawo, nemumiswe yawo; nokuti miswe yawo yakaita senyoka uye ine misoro; uye anokuvadza nayo.

Zvino vakasara vevanhu, vasina kuurawa pamatambudziko awa, havana kutendeuka pamabasa emaoko avo, kuti varege kunamata madhimoni, nezvifananidzo zvegoridhe nesirivheri nezvendarira nezvemabwe nezvematanda, zvisingagoniwo kuona, zvisinganzwiwo, uye zvisingafambi;
uye havana kutendeuka paumhondi hwavo, kana pauroyi hwavo, kana paupombwe hwavo, kana paumbavha hwavo.
Zvino ndakaona umwe mutumwa ane simba achiburuka kubva kudenga, akapfekedzwa gore; nemurarabungu uri mumusoro
make
added
, uye chiso chake chakaita sezuva, netsoka dzake sembiru dzemoto;
uye wakange ane bhuku diki rakazaruka muruoko rwake; ndokuisa rutsoka rwake rwerudyi pamusoro pegungwa, nerweruboshwe pamusoro penyika;
zvino akadanidzira nenzwi guru seshumba inodzvova; wakatiwo adanidzira, kutinhira kunomwe kukareva manzwi ako.

Zvino kutinhira kunomwe kwakati kwareva manzwi ako, ndakange ndododa kunyora; ndokunzwa inzwi kubva kudenga richiti kwandiri: Zarira nemucherechedzo kutinhira kunomwe zvakwareva, uye usanyora zvinhu izvi.
Zvino mutumwa wandakaona amire pamusoro pegungwa nepamusoro penyika wakasimudzira ruoko rwake kudenga,
ndokupika naiye anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi, wakasika denga nezviri mariri, nenyika nezviri mairi, negungwa nezviri mariri, kuti nguva haichazovipo.
Asi pamazuva enzwi remutumwa wechinomwe, kana woda kuridza, ipapo chakavanzika chaMwari chapedziswa, sezvaakaparidzira varanda vake vaporofita.
Zvino inzwi randakanzwa kubva kudenga, rakataura kwandirizve, ndokuti: Enda, tora bhuku diki rakazaruka riri muruoko rwemutumwa amire pamusoro pegungwa nepamusoro penyika.
Zvino ndakaenda kumutumwa, ndichiti kwaari: Ndipe bhuku diki. Zvino akati kwandiri: Tora ugoridya uripedze; zvino richavavisa dumbu rako, asi mumuromo mako richatapira seuchi.
Zvino ndakatora bhuku diki kubva muruoko rwemutumwa, ndokuridya rikapera; ndokuva mumuromo mangu seuchi, kutapira; asi ndaridya, dumbu rangu rakavava.
Zvino akati kwandiri: Iwe unofanira kuporofitazve pamberi pevanhu nendudzi nendimi nemadzimambo mazhinji.
Zvino kwakapiwa kwandiri rutsanga rwakaita semudonzvo, mutumwa ndokumira achiti: Simuka, zvino yera tembere yaMwari, nearitari, nevanonamata mairi.
Asi chivanze chiri kunze kwetembere urasire panze, uye usachiyera; nokuti chakapiwa kuvechirudzi; uye vachatsikira guta dzvene pasi mwedzi makumi mana nemiviri.
Zvino ndichapa
simba
added
kuzvapupu zvangu zviviri, zvino zvichaporofita mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu, zvakapfeka masaga.
Ava miti miviri yemiorivhi, nezvigadziko zvemwenje zviviri zvimire pamberi paMwari wenyika.
Zvino kana kune anoshuva kuvakuvadza, moto unobuda mumuromo wavo uchiparadza vavengi vavo; uye kana umwe achishuva kuvakuvadza, anofanira kuurawa saizvozvo.
Ava vane simba rekupfiga denga, kuti kusanaya mvura pamazuva ekuporofita kwavo, uye vane simba pamusoro pemvura, kuti vaishandure ive ropa, nekurova nyika nematambudziko ese nguva dzese dzavanoda.
Uye kana vapedza uchapupu hwavo, chikara chinokwira kubva mugomba risina chigadziko chichaita hondo navo, ndokuvakunda nekuvauraya.
Uye zvitunha zvavo
zvichava
added
panzira dzemuguta guru, rinonzi pamweya Sodhoma neEgipita, pakarovererwawo Ishe wedu.
Zvino vanobva kuvanhu nevemarudzi nevendimi nevendudzi vachaona zvitunha zvavo mazuva matatu nehafu, uye havangatenderi zvitunha zvavo kuti zviiswe mumakuva.
Neavo vanogara panyika vachafara pamusoro pavo nekupembera, uye vachatumirana zvipo, nokuti vaporofita ava vaviri vakatambudza vanogara panyika.
Zvino shure kwemazuva matatu nehafu, mweya weupenyu kubva kuna Mwari wakapinda mavari, vakamira netsoka dzavo, uye kutya kukuru kukawira vakavaona.
Zvino vakanzwa inzwi guru richibva kudenga, richiti kwavari: Kwirai pano. Zvino vakakwira kudenga vari mugore, vavengi vavo ndokuvaona.

Zvino nenguva iyoyo kwakava nekudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, chegumi cheguta ndokuwa, nemazita evanhu zvuru zvinomwe vakaurawa mukudengenyeka kwenyika; vakasara ndokuvhunduswa, vakapa rumbidzo kuna Mwari wekudenga.
Nhamo yechipiri yapfuura; zvino tarira, nhamo yechitatu inokurumidza kuuya.
Zvino mutumwa wechinomwe wakaridza; manzwi makuru ndokuva kudenga, achiti: Ushe hwenyika hwava hwaIshe wedu, nehwaKristu wake; uye achatonga kusvika rinhi narinhi.
Uye vakuru makumi maviri nevana vagere pamberi paMwari pazvigaro zvavo zveushe vakawa nezviso zvavo vakanamata Mwari,
vachiti: Tinokuvongai, Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose, aripo, wakange aripo, neachauya, nokuti makatora simba renyu guru, uye makatonga.

Zvino marudzi akatsamwa, uye kutsamwa kwenyu kwasvika, nenguva yevakafa kuti vatongwe, uye kuti mupe mubairo kuvaranda venyu vaporofita, nekuvatsvene, nevanotya zita renyu, vadiki nevakuru, uye yekuparadza vanoparadza nyika.
Zvino kwakazarurwa tembere yaMwari kudenga; kukaonekwa areka yesungano yake mutembere yake; ndokuvapo mheni nemanzwi nekutinhira nekudengenyeka kwenyika nechimvuramabwe chikuru.
Zvino kwakaonekwa chiratidzo chikuru kudenga, mukadzi akapfeka zuva, nemwedzi uri pasi petsoka dzake, nepamusoro wake korona yenyeredzi gumi nembiri;
uye wakange ane pamuviri, akadanidzira achirwadziwa nemimba, uye achitambudzwa kupona.
Zvino kwakaonekwa chimwe chiratidzo kudenga, tarirawo, zibukanana ziguru zidzvuku, rine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi, nepamisoro yaro korona nomwe.
Zvino muswe waro wakakweva chetatu chenyeredzi dzekudenga, ndokudzikandira panyika; zibukanana ndokumira pamberi pemukadzi wakange oda kupona, kuti kana apona, agoparadza mwana wake.
Zvino wakapona mwana mukomana, wakange oda kufudza marudzi ese netsvimbo yedare; mwana wake ndokubvutirwa kuna Mwari nekuchigaro chake cheushe.
Zvino mukadzi akatizira kurenje, kwaakange ane nzvimbo yakagadzirwa kubva kuna Mwari, kuti vamuriritira ipapo mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu.
Zvino kukava nehondo kudenga; Mikaeri nevatumwa vake vakarwa nezibukanana, zibukanana ndokurwa rine vatumwa varo;
asi havana kukunda, uye nzvimbo yaro haina kuzowanikwa zvekare kudenga.
Zvino zibukanana ziguru rakakandwa, nyoka yekare, inonzi Dhiabhorosi uye Satani, anonyengera nyika yese; wakakandirwa panyika, nevatumwa vake vakakandwa pamwe naye.

Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru richiti kudenga: Ikozvino ruponeso rwasvika, nesimba, neushe hwaMwari wedu, neumambo hwaKristu wake; nokuti mupomeri wehama dzedu wakandirwa pasi, anovapomera pamberi paMwari wedu masikati neusiku.
Zvino ivo vakamukunda neropa reGwayana, uye neshoko reuchapupu hwavo, uye havana kuda upenyu hwavo kusvikira parufu.
Naizvozvi farai, matenga nemwi munogara maari. Mune nhamo vagari venyika negungwa, nokuti dhiabhorosi wakaburukira kwamuri ane kutsamwa kukuru, nokuti anoziva kuti ane nguva diki.
Zvino zibukanana rakati raona kuti rakandirwa panyika, rakashusha mukadzi wakapona murume.
Zvino kumukadzi kwakapiwa mapapiro maviri egondo guru, kuti abhururukire kurenje kunzvimbo yake, kwaanonoriritirwa kwenguva ne
dzimwe
added
nguva nehafu yenguva, abve pauso hwenyoka.
Zvino nyoka yakabudisa mvura mumuromo mayo yakaita serwizi shure kwemukadzi kuti imukonzerese kukukurwa nerwizi.
Zvino nyika yakabatsira mukadzi, nyika ndokushamisa muromo wayo, ikamedza rwizi zibukanana rwarakabudisa mumuromo maro.
Zvino zibukanana rakatsamwira mukadzi, rikaenda kunoita hondo nevakasara vembeu yake, vanochengeta mirairo yaMwari, vane uchapupu hwaJesu Kristu.
Zvino ndakamira pamusoro pejecha regungwa, ndokuona chikara chichibuda mugungwa, chine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi, nepamusoro penyanga dzacho korona gumi, nepamusoro pemisoro yacho zita rekunyomba.

Zvino chikara ichi chandakaona chakange chakaita sengwe, netsoka dzacho sedzebheya*, nemuromo wacho semuromo weshumba. Zibukanana rikapa kwachiri simba raro, nechigaro charo cheushe, nemasimba makuru.
Zvino ndakaona umwe wemisoro yacho wakaita sewakaurawa kusvika parufu; asi vanga racho rekufa rakange rapodzwa; nyika yese ikashamisika shure kwechikara.
Vakanamata zibukanana rakapa simba kuchikara, vakanamata chikara, vachiti: Ndiani wakafanana nechikara? Ndiani anogona kuita hondo nacho?
Zvino kukapiwa kwachiri muromo unotaura zvinhu zvikuru nekunyomba; kukapiwawo kwachiri simba rekubata mwedzi makumi mana nemiviri.
Ndokushamisa muromo wacho kuti chinyombe Mwari,
ne
added
kunyomba zita rake, netabhenakeri yake, neavo vanogara kudenga.
Zvino kwakapiwa kwachiri kuita hondo nevatsvene, nekuvakunda; kukapiwawo kwachiri masimba pamusoro perudzi rwese nerurimi nerudzi.
Uye vese vanogara panyika vachachinamata, vane mazita asina kunyorwa mubhuku reupenyu reGwayana rakabaiwa kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika.
Kana umwe ane nzeve, ngaanzwe.
Kana umwe achiunganidza muutapwa, anoenda muutapwa; kana umwe achiuraya nemunondo, zvakamufanira kuurawa nemunondo. Ndipo pane kutsungirira nerutendo rwevatsvene.
Zvino ndakaona chimwe chikara chichikwira kubva panyika; uye chakange chine nyanga mbiri segwayana, ndokutaura sezibukanana.
Uye chakashandisa simba rese rechikara chekutanga pamberi pacho uye chinoita kuti nyika nevagere mukati mayo kuti vanamate chikara chekutanga,
chiya
added
chine vanga rinouraya rakaporeswa.
Chinoitawo zviratidzo zvikuru, kuti nemoto chinoita kuti uburuke kubva kudenga kuuya panyika pamberi pevanhu.

Zvino chinonyengera avo vanogara panyika nezviratidzo zvakapiwa kwachiri kuti chiite pamberi pechikara, chichiti kune vanogara panyika, ngavaitire mufananidzo chikara chakange chine vanga remunondo, chikararama.
Zvino kwakapiwa kwachiri kupa mweya kumufananidzo wechikara, kutiwo mufananidzo wechikara utaure, chigoita kuti vese vasinganamati mufananidzo wechikara vaurawe.
Chinoitawo vese, vadiki nevakuru, uye vafumi nevarombo, uye vakasununguka nevaranda, kuti vapiwe mucherechedzo muruoko rwavo rwerudyi, kana pahuma dzavo,
uye kuti kusava neumwe anogona kutenga kana kutengesa, kunze kwaiye ane mucherechedzo, kana zita rechikara kana nhamba yezita racho.
Hehuno uchenjeri. Ane kunzwisisa ngaaverenge nhamba yechikara; nokuti inhamba yemunhu; uye nhamba yacho ndimazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nenhanhatu.
Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, Gwayana ramira pagomo Ziyoni, uye rine zvuru zana nemakumi mana nevana, vane zita raBaba varo rakanyorwa pahuma dzavo.
Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi richibva kudenga, senzwi remvura zhinji, uye senzwi remutinhiro mukuru; ndikanzwawo inzwi revaridzi veudimbwa vachiridza udimbwa hwavo.

Zvino vakaimba serwiyo rutsva pamberi pechigaro cheushe, nepamberi pezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, nevakuru; uye hakuna wakagona kudzidza rwiyo, kunze kwezvuru zana nemakumi mana nevana, vakatengwa munyika.
Ava ndivo vasina kusvibiswa nevakadzi; nokuti imhandara. Ava ndivo vanotevera Gwayana kupi zvako kwarinoenda. Ava vakatengwa kubva pavanhu, zvibereko zvekutanga kuna Mwari nekuGwayana.
Uye mumuromo wavo hamuna kuwanikwa kunyengera, nokuti havana chavanopomerwa pamberi pechigaro cheushe chaMwari.
Zvino ndakaona umwe mutumwa achibhururuka pakati pedenga, ane evhangeri yekusingaperi, kuparidzira vanogara panyika, nekurudzi rwese, nedzinza, nerurimi, nevanhu.
Achiti nenzwi guru: Ityai Mwari, uye mupe rumbidzo kwaari, nokuti nguva yemutongo wake yasvika; uye namatai iye wakaita denga nenyika negungwa nezvitubu zvemvura.
Zvino umwe mutumwa wakatevera achiti: Rawa, rawa, Bhabhironi, guta guru, nokuti rakapa marudzi ese kunwa zvewaini yekutsamwa kweupombwe hwaro.
Zvino mutumwa wechitatu wakavatevera, achiti nenzwi guru: Kana pane umwe anonamata chikara nemufananidzo wacho, nekugamuchira mucherechedzo pahuma yake, kana paruoko rwake,
ndiyewo achanwa zvewaini yekutsamwa kwaMwari, yakadururwa mumukombe wekutsamwa kwake, isina kuvhenganiswa; uye acharwadziswa mumoto uye sarufa pamberi pevatumwa vatsvene, nepamberi peGwayana.
Zvino utsi hwekurwadziwa kwavo hunokwira kusvikira rinhi narinhi; uye havana zororo masikati neusiku ivo vanonamata chikara nemufananidzo wacho, uye kana pane anogamuchira mucherechedzo wezita racho.
Hekuno kutsungirira kwevatsvene, hevano vanochengeta mirairo yaMwari nerutendo rwaJesu.
Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi richibva kudenga richiti kwandiri: Nyora,
uti
added
: Vakaropafadzwa vakafa vanofira muna Ishe kubva ikozvino. Hongu, anoreva Mweya, kuti vazorore pakushingaira kwavo; nemabasa avo anotevera pamwe navo.
Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, gore jena, nepamusoro pegore pakagara wakaita seMwanakomana wemunhu, ane korona yegoridhe pamusoro wake, neparuoko rwake jeko rinopinza.
Zvino umwe mutumwa wakabuda mutembere, achidanidzira nenzwi guru kuna iye wakange agere pamusoro pegore,
achiti
added
: Pinza jeko rako ugokohwa; nokuti nguva yekukohwa yakusvikira, nokuti kukohwa kwenyika kwaibva.
Zvino wakange agere pamusoro pegore akakandira jeko rake panyika, nyika ndokukohwewa.
Zvino umwe mutumwa wakabuda mutembere iri kudenga, iyewo ane jeko rinopinza.

Neumwe mutumwa akabuda muaritari, ane simba pamusoro pemoto, akadanidzira nekudana kukuru kuna iye wakange ane jeko rinopinza, achiti: Tuma jeko rako rinopinza, ugounganidza masumbu emuzambiringa wenyika, nokuti mazambiringa awo aibva.
Zvino mutumwa wakakandira jeko rake panyika, ndokuunganidza mazambiringa enyika, akakandira muchisviniro chewaini chikuru chekutsamwa kwaMwari.
Uye chisviniro chewaini chakatsikwa-tsikwa kunze kweguta, ropa rikabuda muchisviniro chewaini kusvikira pamatomu amabhiza, kubva kumastadhia* churu mazana matanhatu.
Zvino ndakaona chimwe chiratidzo kudenga chikuru uye chinoshamisa, vatumwa vanomwe vane matambudziko manomwe ekupedzisira, nokuti mune awa kutsamwa kwaMwari kwakapedzeredzwa.
Ndikaona segungwa regirazi rakavhenganiswa nemoto, neavo vakakunda chikara nemufananidzo wacho nemucherechedzo wacho,
ne
added
nhamba* yezita racho, vamire pagungwa regirazi, vane udimbwa hwaMwari.
Vakaimba rwiyo rwaMozisi muranda waMwari nerwiyo rweGwayana, vachiti: Makuru uye anoshamisa mabasa enyu, Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose; dzakarurama uye ndedzechokwadi nzira dzenyu, Mambo wevatsvene.
Ndiani angatongorega kukutyai, Ishe, nekukudza zita renyu? Nokuti ndimwi mega mutsvene; nokuti marudzi ese achauya uye achanamata pamberi penyu; nokuti zviito zvenyu zvakarurama zvakaratidzwa.
Zvino shure kweizvozvo ndakaona, zvino tarira, yakazarurwa tembere yetabhenakeri yeuchapupu mukudenga;
zvino kwakabuda vatumwa vanomwe vane matambudziko manomwe mutembere, vakapfeka mucheka wakachena unopenya, uye vakamonerwa pazvifuva nemabhanhire egoridhe.
Uye chimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chakapa vatumwa vanomwe ndiro nomwe dzegoridhe dzizere nehasha dzaMwari, anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Tembere ndokuzadzwa neutsi hunobva pakubwinya kwaMwari nepasimba rake; kukasava newakagona kupinda mutembere, kusvikira matambudziko manomwe evatumwa vanomwe apera.
Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru kubva mutembere richiti kuvatumwa vanomwe: Endai, munodurura ndiro dzehasha dzaMwari panyika.
Zvino wekutanga wakaenda, akadurura ndiro yake panyika; ndokuuya ronda rakaipa rinorwadza pavanhu vakange vane mucherechedzo wechikara, nevakanamata mufananidzo wacho.
Zvino mutumwa wechipiri akadurura ndiro yake mugungwa; ndokuva ropa serewakafa; uye mweya mupenyu wega-wega ukafa mugungwa.
Zvino mutumwa wechitatu akadurura ndiro yake munzizi nemuzvitubu zvemvura; ndokuva ropa.
Zvino ndakanzwa mutumwa wemvura achiti: Makarurama, Ishe, aripo, newakange aripo, neachazovapo, nokuti makatonga izvi.
Nokuti vakadurura ropa revatsvene nevaporofita, uye ropa makavapa kuti vanwe; nokuti vakafanira.
Zvino ndakanzwa umwe kubva muaritari achiti: Hongu, Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose, kutonga kwenyu ndekwechokwadi uye kwakarurama.
Zvino mutumwa wechina akadurura ndiro yake pamusoro pezuva; kukapiwa kwariri kupisa vanhu nemoto.
Vanhu ndokupiswa nekupisa kukuru, ndokunyomba zita raMwari ane simba pamusoro pematambudziko awa, vakasatendeukawo kuti vamupe rukudzo.
Zvino mutumwa wechishanu wakadurura ndiro yake pamusoro pechigaro cheushe chechikara; ushe hwacho ndokuva rima, ndokutsenga marimi avo nekurwadzwa.
Zvino vakanyomba Mwari wekudenga nekuda kwemarwadzo avo uye nekuda kwemaronda avo; asi havana kutendeuka pamabasa avo.
Zvino mutumwa wechitanhatu akadurura ndiro yake pamusoro perwizi rukuru Yufuratesi; mvura yarwo ndokupwa, kuti nzira yemadzimambo anobva kumabvazuva igadzirwe.
Zvino ndakaona kubva mumuromo wezibukanana, nekubva mumuromo wechikara, nekubva mumuromo wemuporofita wenhema, mweya yetsvina mitatu sematafi;
nokuti ndiyo mweya yemadhimoni inoita zviratidzo, inobudira pamadzimambo epasi neenyika yese, kuvaunganidzira kuhondo yezuva iro guru raMwari Wemasimbaose.
Tarira, ndinouya sembavha. Wakaropafadzwa anorinda, nekuchengeta nguvo dzake, kuti arege kufamba akashama, vaone nyadzi dzake.
Zvino wakavaunganidzira kunzvimbo inonzi nechiHebheru Arimagedhoni.
Zvino mutumwa wechinomwe akadurura ndiro yake mudenga; kukabuda inzwi guru kubva mutembere yekudenga, kubva pachigaro cheushe, richiti: Zvaitika!

Zvino kwakava nemanzwi nemitinhiro nemheni, ndokuva nekudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, kwakadaro kusina kumbovapo kubva pakuvapo kwevanhu panyika, kudengenyeka kwenyika kune simba rakadai, kwakakura zvakadai.
Zvino guta guru rakava zvikamu zvitatu, maguta emarudzi ndokuwa; Bhabhironi guru ndokurangarirwa pamberi paMwari, kuti aripe mukombe wewaini yekutsamwa kwehasha dzake.
Zvino chiwi chega-chega chikatiza, nemakomo akasawanikwa.
Zvino chimvuramabwe chikuru chinorema setarenda* chikawira pamusoro pevanhu kubva kudenga; vanhu vakanyomba Mwari nekuda kwedambudziko rechimvuramambwe, nokuti dambudziko racho raiva guru kwazvo.
Zvino kwakauya umwe wevatumwa vanomwe vakange vane ndiro nomwe, ndokutaura neni, achiti kwandiri: Uya pano, ndicharatidza kwauri mutongo wemhombwe huru igere pamusoro pemvura zhinji;
madzimambo enyika aakaita upombwe nayo, nevagari vepanyika vakadhakiswa newaini yeupombwe hwayo.
Zvino wakandisengera kurenje mumweya, uye ndakaona mukadzi akatasva chikara chitsvuku, chizere nemazita ekunyomba, chine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi.
Zvino mukadzi wakange akamonera zvine ruvara rwehute nezvitsvuku, uye akashonga goridhe nemabwe anokosha nemaparera*, ane mukombe wegoridhe muruoko rwake uzere nezvinosemesa netsvina yeupombwe hwake.
Nepahuma yake pakange pakanyorwa zita
rekuti
added
: CHAKAVANZIKA, BHABHIRONI GURU, MAI VEMHOMBWE NEZVINOSEMESA ZVENYIKA.
Zvino ndakaona mukadzi akararadza neropa revatsvene, uye neropa rezvapupu zvaJesu. Zvino ndakati ndamuona ndikashamisika nekushamisika kukuru.
Zvino mutumwa akati kwandiri: Washamisika nei? Ini ndichakuudza chakavanzika chemukadzi, nechechikara chinomutakura, chine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi.

Chikara chawakaona, chaivapo, uye chisipo; uye choda kukwira chichibva mugomba risina chigadziko, chichienda mukuparadzwa; uye vanogara panyika vasina kunyorwa mazita avo mubhuku reupenyu kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika vachashamisika vachiona chikara chaivapo uye chisipo, kunyange chiripo.
Zvino heino fungwa ine njere. Misoro minomwe ndiwo makomo manomwe mukadzi paagere pamusoro pawo,
uye ndiwo madzimambo manomwe; vashanu vawa, uye umwe aripo, umwe haasati asvika; uye kana achisvika, anofanira kugara chinguvana.
Uye chikara chaivapo, uye chisipo, ndiyewo werusere, uye anobva pavanomwe, uye anoenda mukuparadzwa.
Nenyanga gumi dzawaona, ndiwo madzimambo gumi, asati agamuchira ushe, asi achagamuchira simba semadzimambo pamwe nechikara awa rimwe.
Ava vane fungwa imwe, uye vanopa simba neutongi hwavo kuchikara.
Ava vacharwa neGwayana, uye Gwayana richavakunda, nokuti ndiIshe wemadzishe naMambo wemadzimambo; nevanaro ndevakadanwa nevakasarudzwa nevakatendeka.
Zvino akati kwandiri: Mvura yawaona, pagere mhombwe, ndivo vanhu nezvaunga nemarudzi nendimi.
Uye nyanga gumi dzawaona pamusoro pechikara, avo vachavenga mhombwe, uye vachaiparadza nekuifukura, uye vachadya nyama yayo, nekuipisa nemoto.
Nokuti Mwari wakaisa mumoyo yavo kuti vaite fungwa yake, vaite fungwa imwe, nekupa chikara ushe hwavo, kusvikira mashoko aMwari apedzeredzwa.
Zvino mukadzi wawaona ndiro guta guru, rine umambo pamusoro pemadzimambo enyika.
Zvino shure kwezvinhu izvi ndakaona umwe mutumwa achiburuka kubva kudenga, ane simba guru, nyika ndokuvhenekerwa nokubwinya kwake.
Akadanidzira nesimba nenzwi guru, achiti: Rawa, rawa Bhabhironi guru, uye rava ugaro hwemadhimoni, nejere remweya yese yetsvina, nedendere reshiri dzese dzetsvina dzinovengwa.
Nokuti marudzi ese akanwa zvewaini yehasha dzeupombwe hwaro, nemadzimambo enyika akaita upombwe naro, nevashambadzi venyika vakafuma nesimba reumbozha hwaro.
Zvino ndakanzwa rimwe inzwi kubva kudenga richiti: Budai kubva mariri vanhu vangu, kuti murege kuva vagovani vezvivi zvaro, uye kuti murege kugamuchira zvematambudziko aro;
nokuti zvivi zvaro zvasungana kusvika kudenga, naMwari warangarira zvisakarurama zvaro.
Muritsive sezvarakakutsivaiwo imwi, muchiripamhidzira kupamhidzira kunoenderana nemabasa aro; mumukombe iwoyo marakasanganisa iro, murisanganisire kakapamhidzirwa.

Separakazvikudza kudai napo nekurarama muumbozha, murirwadzise nekurishungurudza saizvozvo; nokuti rinoti mumoyo maro: Ndinogara ndiri mambokadzi, uye handisi chirikadzi, uye handingatongooni kuchema.
Naizvozvo achasvika nezuva rimwe matambudziko aro, rufu nekuchema nenzara; uye richapiswa kwazvo nemoto; nokuti ane simba Ishe Mwari anoritonga.
Nemadzimambo enyika akaita upombwe nekurarama paumbozha naro acharira pamusoro paro nekuchema pamusoro paro, pavachaona utsi hwekupiswa kwaro;
vamire kure nekutya kurwadziwa kwaro, vachiti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru Bhabhironi, guta rakasimba, nokuti kutongwa kwako kwasvika neawa rimwe.
Uye vashambadzi venyika vacharira nekuchema pamusoro paro, nokuti hakuchina munhu achatenga zvitengeswa zvavozve;

zvitengeswa zvegoridhe, nezvesirivheri, nezveibwe rinokosha, nezvemaparera* nezvemucheka wakaisvonaka, nezvine ruvara rwehute, nezvesiriki*, nezvezvitsvuku, nemuti umwe neumwe unonhuhwira, nemarudzi ese emidziyo yenyanga dzenzou, nemarudzi ese emidziyo yematanda anokoshesesa, nezvendarira, nezvedare, nezvemabwe machena;
nekinamoni*, nezvinonhuhwira, namafuta ekuzora, nezvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira, newaini, nemafuta, neupfu hwakatsetseka, nezviyo, nemombe, nemakwai, nezvemabhiza, nengoro, nenhapwa, nemweya yevanhu.
Zvino michero yaichiviwa nemoyo wako yakabva kwauri, nezvinhu zvese zvinobwinya nezvinopenya zvabva kwauri, haungatongozviwanizve.
Vashambadzi vezvinhu izvi, vakafumiswa naro, vachamira kure nekutya kurwadziwa kwaro, vachichema nekurira,
uye vachiti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru, rakange rakapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka nezvine ruvara rwehute nezvitsvuku, uye rakashongedzwa negoridhe nebwe rinokosha nemaparera!
Nokuti neawa rimwe fuma huru yakadai yaparadzwa. Uye mufambisi wezvikepe umwe neumwe, nevese vanofamba pamwe muzvikepe, nevafambi vemuchikepe, nevabati vese vepagungwa vakamira kure,
ndokudanidzira vachiona utsi hwekutsva kwaro, vachiti: Nderipi rakafanana naro guta guru?

Zvino vakadira guruva pamisoro yavo, ndokudanidzira vachirira nekuchema, vachiti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru, maifumiswa nezvinokosha zvaro vese vaiva nezvikepe pagungwa; nokuti rakaparadzwa neawa rimwe.
Fara pamusoro paro, iwe denga, nemwi vaapositori vatsvene, nevaporofita, nokuti Mwari wakatonga mutongo wenyu kwariri.
Zvino mutumwa umwe ane simba wakasimudza ibwe rakaita seguyo guru, akaposhera mugungwa, achiti: Saizvozvo nechisimba Bhabhironi guta guru richaposherwa uye harichazotongowanikwizve.

Nenzwi revaridzi veudimbwa nerevaimbi nerevaridzi venyere nerevaridzi vehwamanda, harichatongonzwikwizve mauri, nemhizha yeumhizha hupi nehupi haichatongowanikwizve mauri, nenzwi reguyo harichatongonzwikwizve mauri;

uye chiedza chemwenje hachichatongovhenekerizve mauri, nenzwi remuwani neremwenga harichatongonzwikwizve mauri; nokuti vashambadzi vako vaiva vakuru venyika; nokuti neuroyi hwako marudzi ese akatsauswa.
Zvino mariri makawanikwa ropa revaporofita nerevatsvene, nerevese vakauraiwa panyika.
Zvino shure kweizvi ndakanzwa inzwi guru rechaunga chikuru kudenga, richiti: Hareruya! Ruponeso nekubwinya nerukudzo nesimba kuna Ishe Mwari wedu;
nokuti mitongo yake ndeyechokwadi uye yakarurama; nokuti wakatonga mhombwe huru yakaodza nyika neupombwe hwayo, uye wakatsiva ropa revaranda vake paruoko rwayo.
Zvino vakati rwechipiri: Hareruya! Neutsi hwaro hunokwira kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Zvino vakuru makumi maviri nevana nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina vakawa vakanamata Mwari wakange agere pachigaro cheushe, vachiti: Ameni, Hareruya!
Inzwi ndokubuda pachigaro cheushe, richiti: Rumbidzai Mwari wedu, imwi mese varanda vake, nevanomutya, zvese vadiki nevakuru.
Zvino ndakanzwa senzwi rechaunga chikuru, uye senzwi remvura zhinji, uye senzwi rekutinhira kune simba richiti: Hareruya! Nokuti anotonga Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose.
Ngatifare, tipembere, nekupa rukudzo kwaari; nokuti muchato weGwayana wasvika, uye mukadzi waro wazvigadzirira.
Kwaari kwakapiwa kuti amonere mucheka wakaisvonaka wakachena uye unopenya; nokuti mucheka wakaisvonaka ndiwo kururama kwevatsvene.
Zvino wakati kwandiri: Nyora,
uti
added
: Vakaropafadzwa vakakokwa kuchirairo chemuchato weGwayana. Ndokuti kwandiri: Awa mashoko echokwadi aMwari.
Zvino ndakawira pamberi petsoka dzake kuti ndimunamate; ndokuti kwandiri: Rega
kudaro
added
; ndiri muranda pamwe newe nehama dzako dzine uchapupu hwaJesu; namata Mwari, nokuti ndihwo uchapupu hwaJesu mweya wechiporofita.
Zvino ndakaona denga rakazarurwa, zvino tarira, bhiza jena, newakange agere pamusoro paro anonzi Wakatendeka neWechokwadi, uye pakururama anotonga nekurwa.
Zvino meso ake akaita semurazvo wemoto; nepamusoro wake pane korona zhinji, ane zita rakanyorwa risina munhu wakariziva kunze kwake.
Zvino wakamonera nguvo yakanyikwa muropa; uye zita rake rinonzi shoko raMwari.
Uye hondo
dzaiva
added
kudenga dzakamutevera dzakatasva mabhizha machena, dzakapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka muchena wakashambidzika.
Zvino mumuromo make makabuda munondo unopinza, kuti nawo arove marudzi; uye iye achaatonga netsvimbo yedare; uye iye anotsika chisviniro chewaini chehasha uye chekutsamwa kwaMwari Wemasimbaose.
Uye panguvo nepachidzva chake pakange pakanyorwa zita
rinoti
added
: MAMBO WEMADZIMAMBO NAISHE WEMADZISHE.
Zvino ndakaona mutumwa umwe amire muzuva; akadanidzira nenzwi guru, achiti kushiri dzese dzinobhururuka pakati pedenga: Uyai muungane pamwe pachirairo chaMwari mukuru,

kuti mudye nyama yemadzimambo, nenyama yevakuru vezvuru zvemazana, nenyama yevanhu vane simba, nenyama yemabhiza neyevatasvi vawo, nenyama yezvese, zvese yevakasununguka neyevakasungwa, zvese yevadiki neyevakuru.
Zvino ndakaona chikara, nemadzimambo enyika nehondo dzavo vakaungana pamwe kuti vaite hondo newakange akatasva bhiza, uye nehondo yake.

Zvino chikara chakabatwa, uye pamwe nacho muporofita wenhema wakaita zviratidzo pamberi pacho, zvaakanyengera nazvo vaya vakagamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara, nevakanamata mufananidzo wacho. Ava vese vakakandirwa vari vapenyu mudziva remoto unotsva nesarufa.
Uye vakasara vakaurawa nemunondo wewakange akatasva bhizha, wakabuda mumuromo make; neshiri dzese dzikagutiswa nenyama yavo.
Zvino ndakaona mutumwa achiburuka kubva kudenga, ane kiyi yegomba risina chigadziko, neketani huru muruoko rwake.
Zvino akabata zibukanana, nyoka yakare, ndiye Dhiabhorosi naSatani, akamusunga makore churu,

ndokumukandira mugomba risina chigadziko, ndokumupfigira, ndokuisa mucherechedzo pamusoro pake kuti arege kuzonyengerazve marudzi, kusvikira makore churu apera; zvino shure kweizvozvo anofanira kusunungurwa chinguva chidiki.
Zvino ndakaona zvigaro zveushe, uye vakagara pamusoro pazvo, kutonga ndokupiwa kwavari;
ndikaona
added

nemweya yevakange vagurwa misoro nekuda kweuchapupu hwaJesu, uye nekuda kweshoko raMwari, nevasina kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho, kana kugamuchira mucherechedzo pahuma yavo, neparuoko rwavo; zvino vakararama vakabata ushe pamwe naKristu makore churu.
Asi vakasara vevakafa havana kuraramazve kusvikira makore churu apera. Uku kumuka kwekutanga.
Wakaropafadzwa uye mutsvene ane mugove pakumuka kwekutanga; pane ava rufu rwechipiri harwuna simba; asi vachava vapristi vaMwari nevaKristu, uye vachabata ushe pamwe naye makore churu.
Zvino panopera makore churu, Satani achasunungurwa kubva mutirongo rake,
zvino uchabuda kutsausa marudzi ari kumativi mana enyika,
ivo
added
Gogi naMagogi, avaunganidzire hondo; uwandu hwavo hwakaita sejecha regungwa.
Vakakwira pakufara kwenyika, vakakomba musasa wevatsvene neguta rinodikanwa; moto ndokuburuka kubva kuna Mwari uchibva kudenga ndokuvamedza.
Zvino dhiabhorosi wakavatsausa akakandwa mudziva remoto nesarufa, pane chikara nemuporofita wenhema, uye vacharwadziwa masikati neusiku kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Zvino ndakaona chigaro cheushe chikuru chichena, newakange agere pamusoro pacho, iye nyika nedenga zvakatiza pachiso chake, zvikasawanirwa nzvimbo.

Uye ndakaona vakafa, vadiki nevakuru, vamire pamberi paMwari, mabhuku ndokuzarurwa, nerimwe bhuku rikazarurwa, rinova reupenyu; vakafa vakatongwa kubva pane zvakange zvakanyorwa mumabhuku, zvichienderana nemabasa avo.
Zvino gungwa rakapa vakafa vakange vari mariri; nerufu negehena zvikapa vakafa vakange vari mazviri; umwe neumwe akatongwa zvichienderana nemabasa avo.
Zvino rufu negehena zvakakandirwa mudziva remoto; urwu rufu rwechipiri.
Zvino kana aripo asina kuwanikwa akanyorwa mubhuku reupenyu, wakakandirwa mudziva remoto.
Zvino ndakaona denga idzva nenyika itsva, nokuti denga rekutanga nenyika yekutanga zvakange zvapfuura, uye gungwa rakange risisipo.
Zvino ini Johwani ndakaona guta dzvene, Jerusarema idzva, richiburuka kubva kuna Mwari kubva kudenga, rakagadzirirwa semwenga wakashongedzerwa murume wake.
Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru kubva kudenga, richiti: Tarira, tabhenakeri yaMwari iri pavanhu, iye achagara navo, uye ivo vachava vanhu vake; naMwari amene achava navo,
ari
added
Mwari wavo.
Zvino Mwari achapusika misodzi yese kubva pameso avo, nerufu haruchazovipo, kana kushungurudzika, kana kurira, kana kurwadziwa hakungachavipo; nokuti zvinhu zvekutanga zvapfuura.
Zvino agere pachigaro cheushe wakati: Tarira, ndinoita zvinhu zvese zvive zvitsva. Ndokuti kwandiri: Nyora; nokuti mashoko awa ndeechokwadi uye akatendeka.
Zvino akati kwandiri: Zvaitika. Ndini Arifa naOmega, Kutanga neKupedzisira. Ini ndichapa kuna iye ane nyota zvinobva pachitubu chemvura yeupenyu pachena.
Anokunda achagara nhaka yezvinhu zvese; uye ndichava Mwari wake, naiye achava mwanakomana wangu.

Asi vanotya, nevasingatendi, nevanyangadzi, nemhondi, nemhombwe, nevaroyi, nevanonamata zvifananidzo, nevese varevi venhema, vachava nemugove wavo mudziva rinopfuta nemoto nesarufa; rwunova rufu rwechipiri.
Zvino kwakauya kwandiri umwe wevatumwa vanomwe vakange vane ndiro nomwe dzizere nematambudziko manomwe ekupedzisira, akataura neni, achiti: Uya pano ndigokuratidza mwenga, mukadzi weGwayana.
Zvino wakanditakurira muMweya kugomo guru uye refu, akandiratidza guta guru, Jerusarema dzvene, richiburuka kubva kudenga kubva kuna Mwari,
rine kubwinya kwaMwari; uye chiedza charo chakaita sebwe rinokoshesesa, sebwe rejasipisi*, rinonjenjemera sekrisitaro*;
uye rakange rine rusvingo rukuru uye rurefu, rine masuwo gumi nemaviri, nevatumwa gumi nevaviri pamusuwo, nemazita akanyorwa pamusoro, ari emarudzi gumi nemaviri evana vaIsraeri.
Kumabvazuva masuwo matatu; kumaodzanyemba masuwo matatu; kuchamhembe masuwo matatu; nekumavirira masuwo matatu;
zvino rusvingo rweguta rwakange rwune nheyo gumi nembiri, nepadziri mazita evaapositori gumi nevaviri veGwayana.
Zvino wakataura neni wakange ane rutsanga rwegoridhe, kuti ayere guta, namasuwo aro, nerusingo rwaro.
Zvino guta rakange rakamiswa rakaenzana mativi mana, nekureba kwaro kwakakura kudai sekufara; ndokuyera guta nerutsanga,
rikasvika
added
pamastadhia* zvuru gumi nezviviri; kureba nekufara nekukwirira kwaro zvakaenzana.
Zvino wakayera rusvingo rwaro, mbimbi zana nemakumi mana nemana, chiyero chemunhu, chinova chemutumwa.
Uye maiva nechivakwa cherusvingo rwaro, jasipisi, uye guta
riri
added
goridhe rakakwana, rakafanana negirazi rakachenesesa.
Nenheyo dzerusvingo rweguta dzakashongedzwa nebwe rimwe nerimwe rinokosha. Nheyo yekutanga ijasipisi, yepiri isafiri*, yetatu ikarikidhoni*, yechina iemaradhi*,
yeshanu isaridhonikisi*, yetanhatu isaridhio*, yechinomwe ikrisoriti*, yerusere bheriri*, yepfumbamwe topasi*, yegumi kirisopirasi*, yegumi neimwe hiasindi*, yegumi nembiri ametesiti*.
Zvino masuwo gumi nemaviri maparera gumi nemaviri; rimwe nerimwe remasuwo rakange riri reparera rimwe; uye nzira yemuguta igoridhe rakakwana segirazi rinonjenjemera.
Zvino handina kuona tembere mukati marwo, nokuti Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose itembere yarwo, neGwayana.
Zvino guta harishaiwi zuva kana mwedzi kuvhenekera mariri; nokuti kubwinya kwaMwari kunorivhenekera, nemwenje waro iGwayana;
zvino marudzi evanoponeswa achafamba muchiedza charo, nemadzimambo enyika achauisa kubwinya nerukudzo rwawo mariri.
Zvino masuwo aro haangatongopfigwi masikati, nokuti usiku hahuchazovipo.
